name: Squid Fighter
description:
This is a single/multiplayer swording shooting and fighting arena. Now it contains 2 different Game mode, one is chaos Fighting ( 4 team fighting Death match).the other is Team Fighting (2 team Death match), you can set the winning score at the room setup page, and the judgment criteria for game victory is that the team which has reached the winning score first. Two game modes has two different maps each. Now it also contains four different career for each player, they have different ability, you can switch the character any times you want during the game, but it will exhausts one of your life. You and your friends are invited to take participate in. People are divided into different 2 or 3 or 4 team, Using your intelligence and Action to get to know WHO WILL SURVIVE, and the last team will get a extremely huge prize! Sharing this game to your friends, lover, parent, classmates, teachers, colleague, grandparents or even Jeffrey Dahmer to have fun!

WASD to Move, Left Mouse/ R Key to Fight, Right Mouse to Aim, Shift+ Tab to invite friends from Steam. Right now the game is keeping update, we will add more and more crazy functions to this game, please keeping an eye on it, Thanks for your understanding.

这是一个单人/多人剑术射击和格斗竞技场。现在包含2种不同的游戏模式，一种是混沌格斗（4队格斗死亡赛），另一种是团战（2队死亡斗），可以在房间设置页面设置获胜分数，游戏胜负的判断标准是先达到获胜分数的队伍。两种游戏模式各有两张不同的地图。现在它还包含每个玩家的四种不同的职业，他们有不同的能力，你可以在游戏中随时切换角色，但它会耗尽你的一个生命。 欢迎您和您的朋友参加。人们被分成不同的2或3或4团队，利用你的智慧和行动来了解谁将生存，最后一支团队将获得极其丰厚的奖励！分享这个游戏给你的朋友，爱人，父母，同学，老师，同事，祖父母甚至杰弗里达默,玩得开心！

WASD 移动，鼠标左键/R 键战斗，鼠标右键瞄准，Shift+ Tab 邀请来自 Steam 的朋友。现在游戏正在不断更新，我们将为这款游戏添加越来越多的疯狂功能，请密切关注，感谢您的理解。
